item.title: TAMods hotfix v1.12 Available Now
item.description: Just pushed some updates for the client TAMods DLL. Updates are focused on community servers.

item.title: TribesLauncherSharp 1.0.0.0 Available Now
item.description: This is the initial version of a totally rewritten TAMods Launcher. With any luck this should be substantially more straightforward to use than the existing one (although it may be somewhat less pretty).

item.title: TribesLauncherSharp 1.1.0.0 Available Now
item.description: This release primarily features a new tabbed layout. It includes a couple of minor feature additions under the 'Advanced' tab, including selectable process detection mode, and custom command line arguments.

item.title: TribesLauncherSharp 1.1.1.0 Available Now
item.description: Hotfix to remove an unneeded debug info window, and a couple of minor UI fixes affecting Windows 7.

item.title: TribesLauncherSharp 1.1.1.0 Available Now
item.description: Fix to allow TLS 1.2 for update server downloads.

item.title: TAMods v1.18 Available Now
item.description: For those who regularly play, particularly on the community servers, you may have noticed a couple of TAMods updates recently (versions 1.17 and 1.18).

item.title: TAMods v0.7 Available Now
item.description: A new major version of TAMods, version 0.7, has now been released and is available via the TribesLauncher application.
